name: Beats in the Sky: Music Showcase
description:
ðŸŽµ Beats in the Sky: A Music Listening Session ðŸŽµ

Elevate your senses at the Willis Tower with a curated selection of groundbreaking artists from the Web 3 space. Dive deep into the world of new music, engage directly with the artists behind the beats, and seize the opportunity to mingle with like-minded musical creatives.

ðŸŒŒ Featured Artists ðŸŒŒ:

5unde' : Alternative Hip-hop/RnB/Lofi Trap
(Accompanied by his production team)

Rhino: Alternative Hip-hop

xBohiti: Alternative
(Partnered with XTincT, Engineer/producer)

NickiYuno: Alternative Hip-hop

Jay Masz: Alternative Hip-hop

Osama: Hip-hop

Chesbro: Alternative

Day Kay: Alternative Hip-hop

XTincT: Alternative Hip-hop

Lord Haiti: World/Hip-hop

Tippi Fifestarr: Banjo/World

Cullah: Indie

Vessy Mink: Folk/Indie/Alternative

David Prorok: Rap

Prepare to be immersed in an auditory experience like no other, as we celebrate the sounds of the future. Join us, connect, and be a part of the ever-evolving musical landscape of Web 3.

speakers.name: Tippi Fifestarr
speakers.bio: Creative  founder with high developer empathy, communicative teammate and enthusiastic  DevRel professional. I have a strong background in the Ethereum, Polygon, Filecoin & Chainlink ecosystems. Experience in mentoring and contributing to decentralized projects, passionate about fostering community engagement, and skilled in organizing events and workshops. Adept at building and maintaining complex systems, as well as real relationships with developers and key community members, globally. I want to help the next generation of developers succeed in building transformative decentralized applications.
